partitions.name: Dim_PURCHASE_ORDER_LINE_MATERIAL_CHARGES
partitions.expression:
let
                Source = Value.NativeQuery(
                    #"SQL Database",
                    "SELECT DISTINCT [ITEM_NUMBER], [SITE_NUMBER], ISNULL(CAST([ITEM_NUMBER] AS NVARCHAR(50)), '') + '|' + ISNULL(CAST([SITE_NUMBER] AS NVARCHAR(50)), '') as [ITEM_NUMBER_SITE_NUMBER_Key] FROM (SELECT [ITEM_NUMBER], [SITE_NUMBER] FROM [PURCHASE_ORDER_LINE] UNION ALL SELECT [ITEM_NUMBER], [SITE_NUMBER] FROM [MATERIAL_CHARGES]) AS CombinedKeys WHERE ISNULL(CAST([ITEM_NUMBER] AS NVARCHAR(50)), '') + '|' + ISNULL(CAST([SITE_NUMBER] AS NVARCHAR(50)), '') IS NOT NULL AND ISNULL(CAST([ITEM_NUMBER] AS NVARCHAR(50)), '') + '|' + ISNULL(CAST([SITE_NUMBER] AS NVARCHAR(50)), '') <> ''''''",
                    null, 
                    [EnableFolding = true]
                )
                in
                Source
